title: Two Sum
description: Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target.

title: Subarray with Given Sum
description: Given an unsorted array of non-negative integers, find a continuous subarray which adds to a given number S.

title: Longest Consecutive Sequence
description: Given an unsorted array of integers, find the length of the longest consecutive elements sequence.

title: Maximum Subarray (Kadane's)
description: Find the contiguous subarray within an array which has the largest sum.

title: Merge Intervals
description: Given an array of intervals, merge all overlapping intervals.

title: Product of Array Except Self
description: Given an integer array nums, return an array answer such that answer[i] is equal to the product of all the elements of nums except nums[i].

title: Sort Colors (Dutch National Flag)
description: Sort an array with values 0, 1, and 2 in-place.

title: Spiral Matrix
description: Given an m x n matrix, return all elements in spiral order.

title: Rotate Image (90 degrees)
description: Rotate an n x n 2D matrix by 90 degrees clockwise in-place.

title: Search in Rotated Sorted Array
description: Search for a target value in a rotated sorted array. Return its index or -1.

title: Find Missing Number
description: Given an array nums containing n distinct numbers in the range [0, n], return the missing number.

title: Trapping Rain Water
description: Given n non-negative integers representing an elevation map, compute how much water it can trap.

title: Next Permutation
description: Implement next permutation, which rearranges numbers into the next lexicographically greater permutation.

title: Set Matrix Zeroes
description: Given an m x n matrix, if an element is 0, set its entire row and column to 0.

title: Find Duplicate Number
description: Given an array of integers nums containing n+1 integers where each integer is in [1,n], find the duplicate.

title: Maximum Product Subarray
description: Given an integer array, find the contiguous subarray that has the largest product.

title: Jump Game
description: Determine if you can reach the last index given an array of maximum jump lengths.

title: Minimum Swaps to Sort
description: Given an array of n distinct elements, find the minimum number of swaps required to sort the array.

title: Longest Mountain in Array
description: Find the length of the longest mountain subarray.

title: Subarrays with K Different Integers
description: Return the count of subarrays with exactly K different integers.

title: Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters
description: Given a string s, find the length of the longest substring without repeating characters.

title: Group Anagrams
description: Given an array of strings, group the anagrams together.

title: Longest Palindromic Substring
description: Given a string s, return the longest palindromic substring.

title: Valid Anagram
description: Given two strings s and t, return true if t is an anagram of s.

title: String Compression
description: Implement basic string compression using the counts of repeated characters.

title: Decode Ways
description: Given a string s containing only digits, return the number of ways to decode it.

title: Multiply Strings
description: Given two non-negative integers num1 and num2 represented as strings, return the product as a string.

title: Rabin-Karp Substring Search
description: Implement Rabin-Karp algorithm for pattern searching in a string.

title: Count and Say
description: Generate the nth term in the Count and Say sequence.

title: Longest Common Prefix
description: Find the longest common prefix string amongst an array of strings.

title: Integer to Roman / Roman to Integer
description: Convert an integer to its Roman numeral representation.

title: Reverse Words in a String
description: Given an input string s, reverse the order of the words.

title: Palindrome Pairs
description: Given a list of unique words, find all pairs that form palindromes when concatenated.

title: Implement strstr() (Substring Search)
description: Return the index of the first occurrence of needle in haystack, or -1 if needle is not part of haystack.

title: Isomorphic Strings
description: Given two strings s and t, determine if they are isomorphic.

title: Longest Repeating Character Replacement
description: Find the length of the longest substring containing the same letter after at most k character replacements.

title: Minimum Window Substring
description: Given strings s and t, return the minimum window substring of s that contains every character of t.

title: Subarrays with Sum Equal to K
description: Given an array of integers and an integer k, return the total number of subarrays whose sum equals k.

title: Count Distinct Elements in Every Window
description: Given an array and a window size, count distinct elements in every window.

title: Find All Anagrams in a String
description: Given two strings s and p, return an array of all the start indices of p's anagrams in s.

title: Top K Frequent Elements
description: Given an integer array and an integer k, return the k most frequent elements.

title: Longest Substring with At Most K Distinct Characters
description: Given a string s and integer k, return the length of the longest substring with at most k distinct characters.

title: Substring with Concatenation of All Words
description: Find all starting indices where the substring is a concatenation of each word in words exactly once.

title: Check for Permutation in String
description: Given two strings s1 and s2, return true if s2 contains a permutation of s1.

title: Smallest Substring with All Characters of Pattern
description: Find the smallest window in a string containing all characters of another string.

examples.input: s = "this is a test string", p = "tist"

title: N-Queens
description: Place N queens on an NÃ—N chessboard so that no two queens threaten each other.

title: Sudoku Solver
description: Write a program to solve a Sudoku puzzle by filling the empty cells.

title: Generate Parentheses
description: Given n pairs of parentheses, generate all combinations of well-formed parentheses.

title: Word Search
description: Given an m x n grid of characters and a word, return true if the word exists in the grid.

title: Subsets II (With Duplicates)
description: Given an integer array that may contain duplicates, return all possible subsets (the power set).

title: Combination Sum
description: Given an array of distinct integers and a target, return all unique combinations that sum to target.

title: Letter Combinations of a Phone Number
description: Given a string containing digits 2-9, return all possible letter combinations.

title: Permutations
description: Given an array of distinct integers, return all the possible permutations.

title: Restore IP Addresses
description: Given a string s containing only digits, return all possible valid IP addresses.

title: Palindrome Partitioning
description: Return all possible palindrome partitioning of a string.

title: Climbing Stairs
description: You are climbing a staircase with n steps. Each time you can climb 1 or 2 steps. How many distinct ways can you climb?

title: House Robber
description: Determine the maximum amount of money you can rob without robbing two adjacent houses.

title: Coin Change
description: Find the fewest number of coins needed to make up a given amount.

title: Longest Increasing Subsequence
description: Given an integer array, return the length of the longest strictly increasing subsequence.

title: Longest Palindromic Subsequence
description: Given a string s, find the longest palindromic subsequence's length.

title: Edit Distance
description: Given two strings, return the minimum number of operations (insert, delete, replace) to convert one to another.

title: Unique Paths
description: A robot is at the top-left corner of an m x n grid. Find the number of unique paths to the bottom-right.

title: Decode Ways (DP)
description: Given a string of digits, determine the total number of ways to decode it.

title: Partition Equal Subset Sum
description: Determine if the array can be partitioned into two subsets such that the sum of elements in both subsets is equal.

title: Word Break
description: Given a string s and a dictionary wordDict, determine if s can be segmented into words from the dictionary.

title: Maximum Profit in Job Scheduling
description: Find the maximum profit from scheduling non-overlapping jobs.

title: Minimum Path Sum in Grid
description: Given an m x n grid with non-negative numbers, find a path from top-left to bottom-right minimizing the sum.

title: Paint House
description: There are n houses, each can be painted with one of 3 colors. Find the minimum cost to paint all houses.

title: Wildcard Matching
description: Given an input string and a pattern, implement wildcard pattern matching with '?' and '*'.

title: Burst Balloons
description: Given n balloons with numbers, find the maximum coins you can collect by bursting them wisely.

title: Invert Binary Tree
description: Invert a binary tree (mirror it).

title: Diameter of Binary Tree
description: Given a binary tree, compute the length of the diameter (longest path between any two nodes).

title: Lowest Common Ancestor (LCA)
description: Find the lowest common ancestor of two given nodes in a binary tree.

title: Serialize and Deserialize Binary Tree
description: Design an algorithm to serialize and deserialize a binary tree.

title: Validate Binary Search Tree
description: Determine if a given binary tree is a valid binary search tree.

title: Level Order Traversal
description: Given a binary tree, return the level order traversal of its nodes' values.

title: Kth Smallest in BST
description: Given the root of a BST and an integer k, return the kth smallest value.

title: Path Sum (I, II)
description: Given a binary tree and a target sum, return true if there is a root-to-leaf path with that sum.

title: Construct Binary Tree from Inorder & Preorder
description: Given preorder and inorder traversal arrays, construct the binary tree.

title: Convert Sorted Array to BST
description: Given a sorted array, convert it to a height-balanced BST.

title: Number of Islands
description: Given an m x n grid of '1's (land) and '0's (water), count the number of islands.

title: Clone Graph
description: Return a deep copy of a connected undirected graph.

title: Course Schedule (Topological Sort)
description: Determine if it is possible to finish all courses given prerequisite pairs.

title: Word Ladder
description: Find the shortest transformation sequence from beginWord to endWord.

title: Dijkstra's Algorithm
description: Find the shortest path from a source vertex to all other vertices in a weighted graph.

title: Bellman-Ford Algorithm
description: Find shortest paths from source to all vertices, handling negative weights.

title: Union-Find Cycle Detection
description: Detect a cycle in an undirected graph using Union-Find.

title: Graph Bipartiteness Check
description: Given an undirected graph, check whether it is Bipartite or not.

title: Find Bridges in Graph (Tarjan's)
description: Find all bridges in an undirected graph using Tarjan's algorithm.

title: Kruskal's MST Algorithm
description: Find Minimum Spanning Tree using Kruskal's algorithm.

title: Sieve of Eratosthenes
description: Find all prime numbers up to a given limit using the Sieve of Eratosthenes.

title: GCD using Euclidean Algorithm
description: Find the Greatest Common Divisor of two numbers using the Euclidean algorithm.

title: Count Set Bits
description: Count the number of set bits (1s) in the binary representation of an integer.

title: Power of Two / X to the Power N
description: Implement pow(x, n), which calculates x raised to the power n.

title: Find Missing and Repeating Number
description: Given an array of n integers with values 1 to n, find the repeating and the missing number.

title: Merge K Sorted Lists (Heap)
description: Merge k sorted linked lists and return it as one sorted list.

title: Largest Rectangle in Histogram (Stack)
description: Given an array of integers representing histogram bar heights, find the area of largest rectangle.

title: Gas Station Circular Tour
description: Given two arrays gas and cost, find the starting gas station index for a circular tour.

title: Job Sequencing with Deadlines
description: Given a set of jobs with deadlines and profits, find the maximum profit subset of jobs.

title: Candy Distribution Problem
description: There are n children standing in a line with ratings. Distribute candies following the rules to minimize total candies.
